languages.text: "Я уж и не надеялся услышать подобное! Кровь трону Вольного Торговца! Загоняй их на меня!"

traits.locale_text: "Я уж и не надеялся услышать подобное! Кровь трону Вольного Торговца! Загоняй их на меня!"

languages.text: "I almost had no hope of hearing something like that! Blood for the Rogue Trader's throne! Drive them toward me!"
languages.original_text: "Я уж и не надеялся услышать подобное! Кровь трону Вольного Торговца! Загоняй их на меня!"

traits.locale_text: "I almost had no hope of hearing something like that! Blood for the Rogue Trader's throne! Drive them toward me!"
"I almost had no hope of hearing something like that! Blood for the Rogue Trader's throne! Drive them toward me!"

"I almost had no hope of hearing something like that! Blood for the Rogue Trader's throne! Drive them toward me!"
"I almost had no hope of hearing something like that! Blood for the Rogue Trader's throne! Drive them toward me!"

languages.text: «¡Casi había perdido la esperanza de oír eso! ¡Sangre para el trono del Comerciante Independiente! ¡Conducidlos hacia mí!».
languages.original_text: "I almost had no hope of hearing something like that! Blood for the Rogue Trader's throne! Drive them toward me!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Casi había perdido la esperanza de oír eso! ¡Sangre para el trono del Comerciante Independiente! ¡Conducidlos hacia mí!».

languages.text: “我差点就以为你不会这么说了！血祭行商浪人的王座！把他们赶到我这里来！”
languages.original_text: "I almost had no hope of hearing something like that! Blood for the Rogue Trader's throne! Drive them toward me!"

traits.locale_text: “我差点就以为你不会这么说了！血祭行商浪人的王座！把他们赶到我这里来！”

languages.text: « Je commençais à désespérer de vous l'entendre dire ! Du sang pour le trône du libre-marchand ! Rabattez-les vers moi ! »
languages.original_text: "I almost had no hope of hearing something like that! Blood for the Rogue Trader's throne! Drive them toward me!"

traits.locale_text: « Je commençais à désespérer de vous l'entendre dire ! Du sang pour le trône du libre-marchand ! Rabattez-les vers moi ! »

languages.text: 「まさかそんな言葉が聞けるとはな！ローグトレーダーの王座のために血を！奴らを俺の方へ追い込め！」
languages.original_text: "I almost had no hope of hearing something like that! Blood for the Rogue Trader's throne! Drive them toward me!"

traits.locale_text: 「まさかそんな言葉が聞けるとはな！ローグトレーダーの王座のために血を！奴らを俺の方へ追い込め！」

languages.text: "Ich hatte fast schon keine Hoffnung mehr, so etwas zu hören! Blut für den Thron des Freihändlers! Treibt sie zu mir!"
languages.original_text: "I almost had no hope of hearing something like that! Blood for the Rogue Trader's throne! Drive them toward me!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich hatte fast schon keine Hoffnung mehr, so etwas zu hören! Blut für den Thron des Freihändlers! Treibt sie zu mir!"

languages.text: "Böyle bir şey duymaktan neredeyse umudu kesmiştim! Hür Tacir'in tahtı için kan! Onları bana gönder!"
languages.original_text: "I almost had no hope of hearing something like that! Blood for the Rogue Trader's throne! Drive them toward me!"

traits.locale_text: "Böyle bir şey duymaktan neredeyse umudu kesmiştim! Hür Tacir'in tahtı için kan! Onları bana gönder!"
